programme.title: Sealed With a List
programme.desc: This holiday season, festive Carley sets out to conquer her list of abandoned resolutions from last year. Aided by co-worker Wyatt, she finds love and the confidence to chase her dreams.

programme.title: A Not So Royal Christmas
programme.desc: A tabloid journalist tries to land an interview with a reclusive count during the holidays. In response, the royal family asks a groundskeeper to pose as the count since the real one fled years ago.

programme.title: A Shoe Addict's Christmas
programme.desc: Department store employee Noelle visits Christmases of past, present and future as her guardian angel helps her navigate her wishes for a connection with her father, her dream career and love.

programme.title: Christmas by Design
programme.desc: A fashion designer learns what's most important in life when she joins a Christmas challenge to create a new holiday-themed collection.

programme.title: A Veteran's Christmas
programme.desc: Capt. Grace Garland, a decorated U.S. veteran, returns home after two tours of search and rescue in Afghanistan. After being separated from her beloved K9 partner, Grace must rediscover the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: Long Lost Christmas
programme.desc: Hayley is an interior designer who plans to surprise her recently widowed mother with the perfect holiday present -- the extended family she knows her mom yearns for.

programme.title: Christmas in Notting Hill
programme.desc: Always too busy for love, famous soccer star Graham Savoy soon has a change of heart when he meets a visiting American during Christmastime.

programme.title: Christmas with the Singhs
programme.desc: Newly engaged Asha Singh and Jake O'Brien are excited to spend Christmas together, but their relationship is tested when their families' cultural and holiday traditions clash.

programme.title: Santa Tell Me
programme.desc: A design show host finds a letter from Santa promising to meet her true love, a man named Nick, by Christmas Eve. Meeting three Nicks complicates her search.

programme.title: Three Wiser Men and a Boy
programme.desc: The Brenner brothers are back and putting on a holiday pageant for young Thomas, while trying to cope with life's curveballs, including their mom's new boyfriend.

programme.title: To Have and To Holiday
programme.desc: After a brief courtship, Celeste and Jason get engaged. Celeste then asks her pastor father, who's not ready to let his daughter go, to officiate their Christmas wedding.

programme.title: Christmas Made to Order
programme.desc: When an architect finds himself hosting his family for Christmas, he turns to a holiday coordinator for help. Her expert Christmas spirit brings his family together, but neither expected it to bring them closer to each other.

programme.title: Christmas Made to Order
programme.desc: When an architect finds himself hosting his family for Christmas, he turns to a holiday coordinator for help. Her expert Christmas spirit brings his family together, but neither expected it to bring them closer to each other.

programme.title: November Christmas
programme.desc: A community works together to help a couple bring an early Christmas to their sick 8-year-old daughter (Emily Alyn Lind).

programme.title: The Christmas Cottage
programme.desc: As maid of honor for her best friend Ava, cynical interior designer Lacey is tasked with decorating a honeymoon cottage for the newlyweds. Although it's a simple enough task, she didn't plan on being snowed in with the bride-to-be's sexy brother.

programme.title: Christmas With a Kiss
programme.desc: A woman returns home to help with her family's Christmas Carnival, and romance ignites. A photo journalist curates a surprise reunion.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Tidings of Joy
programme.desc: A skeptical writer shows up in Evergreen to get the scoop on the town's famed passion for Christmas during a search for a long-lost time capsule.

programme.title: Falling Like Snowflakes
programme.desc: Determined to capture a rare shot of a 12-sided snowflake, a photographer enlists help from a childhood friend as they go on a mission they'll never forget.

programme.title: Christmas Class Reunion
programme.desc: Reuniting at Christmastime for their 15-year high school reunion, two former classmates challenge each other to remember who they were, who they are, and who they want to be.

programme.title: It's Christmas, Eve
programme.desc: A school superintendent with a knack for turning around schools meets a single father who works as the head of the school's bankrupt music department. As she rediscovers her passion for music, she works to save the dreams of the kids who love music.

programme.title: The Most Colorful Time of the Year
programme.desc: A colorblind elementary school teacher meets an optometrist who helps bring color into his life in time for the holidays.

programme.title: Rescuing Christmas
programme.desc: Erin unwittingly wishes away Christmas, and Sam steps in to help bring it back.

programme.title: To Have and To Holiday
programme.desc: After a brief courtship, Celeste and Jason get engaged. Celeste then asks her pastor father, who's not ready to let his daughter go, to officiate their Christmas wedding.

programme.title: Picture a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A photographer returns home to take care of her grandmother and gets involved with helping a neighbor look after his young nephew.

programme.title: Christmas in Montana
programme.desc: An efficiency expert goes to Montana before the holidays and attempts to help a man save his ranch.

programme.title: Five Star Christmas
programme.desc: After moving back to her hometown, a woman plots with her siblings and grandparents to help her father's new bed and breakfast get a five-star review from an incognito travel critic.

programme.title: Silver Bells
programme.desc: A teenage runaway (Michael Mitchell) connects his widowed father (Tate Donovan) and a woman (Anne Heche) who lost her husband during a past Christmas holiday.

programme.title: Romance at Reindeer Lodge
programme.desc: Molly and Jared have both sworn off holiday events. When they find themselves stuck at a Christmas-themed ranch, they have no choice but to allow their cynical hearts to melt.

programme.title: A World Record Christmas
programme.desc: An boy with autism is determined to break a Guinness World Record by stacking 1,400 blocks. In the spirit of the holiday, his mother and stepfather organize a fundraiser to give the townspeople an opportunity to decorate and donate a block.

programme.title: Magic Stocking
programme.desc: Lindsey, a widowed single mother, stays closed off to life after losing her husband. When she buys a stocking at a craft fair, her family members begin finding items in it that have importance in their lives.

programme.title: Christmas at Holly Lodge
programme.desc: Sophie Bennett, the owner of the Holly Lodge, tries to convince a developer that the lodge is actually a bad investment.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: Nick loses his high finance job right before Christmas. Lost, he takes a gig at a tree lot, where he meets Julie and her son, Matt.

programme.title: Family for Christmas
programme.desc: After an offhand wish to a man playing Santa Claus, a woman wakes up to find herself married to her college sweetheart.

programme.title: Northern Lights of Christmas
programme.desc: Life deals Zoey Hathaway a strange blow when she inherits a reindeer farm and becomes buried in taking care of the animals and all of the Christmas responsibilities.

programme.title: Project Christmas Wish
programme.desc: A woman's life becomes transformed as she works toward granting a little girl's wish for a Christmas like she used to have with her mother.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

programme.title: A Novel Noel
programme.desc: A NYC book editor takes on a temporary gig running a Maine bookstore. Battling with the owners' son, she rediscovers her passion for nurturing creativity.

programme.title: Karen Kingsbury's Maggie's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Maggie tries to maintain the balance of being a mother and having a career. When her son Jordan needs help at school, he meets Casey, a tutor, and the two quickly bond. As Casey becomes a father figure, Jordan wishes his mom could find love again.

programme.title: To All a Good Night
programme.desc: A small-town photographer saves the life of a mysterious man who may just be here to buy her family's parkland.

programme.title: Unlocking Christmas
programme.desc: When a mysterious key and a cryptic holiday riddle arrive on their doorsteps, Kate and Kevin embark on a romantic Christmas adventure.

programme.title: Welcome to Christmas
programme.desc: A developer finds herself stranded in Christmas, Colo. The town hopes to employ the Christmas spirit to convince her that the community is the best location for a new ski resort.

programme.title: Christmas Encore
programme.desc: A struggling actress finds a renewed passion for her craft when she is cast in an off-Broadway show, a modern take on "A Christmas Carol.".

programme.title: On the Twelfth Day of Christmas
programme.desc: Maggie is thrilled when Mitch, her long time crush, moves back to town. When she learns Mitch's love for Christmas has drastically changed, she tries to bring his holiday spirit back by showing him the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: The Angel Tree
programme.desc: A writer reconnects with a childhood friend while seeking the identity of the person who grants Christmas wishes placed upon an angel tree.

programme.title: A Christmas Treasure
programme.desc: After opening a 100-year-old time capsule, a woman meets a charming chef and wonders if she should move to New York and further her writing career.

programme.title: This Time Each Year
programme.desc: Despite a trial separation, Lauren pretends to still be with her husband, Kevin, to placate her overbearing mother. The ruse may be just what the couple needs to finally work on their marriage.

programme.title: The Christmas Ring
programme.desc: Reporter Kendra Adams searches for the love story behind an antique engagement ring with the help of the grandson of the ring's owner.

programme.title: Christmas With Holly
programme.desc: The owner (Eloise Mumford) of a toy store falls in love with a man (Sean Faris) who cares for his orphaned niece.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Meant for Love
programme.desc: A chance meeting at a weekend wedding celebration brings together Alice and Jack, two singles from very different family backgrounds.

programme.title: Every Christmas Has a Story
programme.desc: While on air, a TV personality accidentally admits she hates Christmas. When she goes to a small town to film a special to repair her image, the Christmas spirit begins to change her life.

programme.title: Fudbal - Turska liga: Bodrum - Galatasaray
programme.desc: Turska Superliga je najviša profesionalna liga Turske u fudbalu. Ova liga osnovana je 1957. godine.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga 2: Hertha - Ulm 1846
programme.desc: Popularna "Cvajta" čini se, nikada nije bila jača. Ko će se od velikana vratiti u prvu ligu? Mesta je malo a kandidata mnogo.

programme.title: Rivalitet legendi
programme.desc: Vukli su jedni druge napred, uvek je neki rivalitet izdizao sport na lestvicu više. Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga: Eintracht - Werder
programme.desc: Fudbalska Bundesliga najviši je rang takmičenje u Nemačkoj koja od 1963. godine i svog osnutka visokom kvalitetom igre oduševljava sve fudbalske poklonike širom sveta.

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal: Arizona State - Brigham Young
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...

programme.title: Na današnji dan
programme.desc: Podsećanje na godišnjice uspeha sportista, klubova i reprezentacije koji su se dogodili na današnji dan.

programme.title: Košarka (M) - Kvalifikacije za EP: Slovenia - Portugal
programme.desc: 41 evropska košarkaška reprezentacija bori se preko kvalifikacija za 24 mesta koje vodi na Evropsko košarkaško prvenstvo. (LIVE).

programme.title: Sport & Tech Lifestyle
programme.desc: Emisija Sport & Tech Lifestyle vodi vas kroz svet najnovijih lifestyle i tehnologija u sportu.

programme.title: Košarka (M) - Kvalifikacije za EP: Italy - Iceland
programme.desc: 41 evropska košarkaška reprezentacija bori se preko kvalifikacija za 24 mesta koje vodi na Evropsko košarkaško prvenstvo. (LIVE).

programme.title: Omaž zvezdama
programme.desc: Bokseri, fudbaleri, košarkaši... Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste.
